verses.verse: But I have trusted in Your mercy; My heart shall rejoice in Your salvation.
I will sing to the LORD, Because He has dealt bountifully with me.

Folly of the Godless, and God’s Final Triumph To the Chief Musician. A Psalm of David. [1] The (Ps. 10:4; 53:1) fool has said in his heart, “There is no God.” They are corrupt, They have done abominable works, There is none who does good.
(Ps. 33:13, 14; 102:19; Rom. 3:11) The LORD looks down from heaven upon the children of men, To see if there are any who understand, who seek God.
(Rom. 3:12) They have all turned aside, They have together become corrupt; There is none who does good, No, not one.
